dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents district line boundaries in Bangladesh. The Global Map Bangladesh version 2 was developed based on Global Map Specifications version 2.1. The data source of this is 1:50,000 scale map which base map of Survey of Bangladesh by using geoconcept Software.Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
